TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Satabakiyay_nu_aenengan_nu_lacu, title = Satabakiyay_nu_aenengan_nu_lacu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satabakiyay_nu_aenengan_nu_lacu} }

S.FORM: == Satabakiyay nu aenengan nu lacu / Ta-Paw-Tay == Satabakiay nu aenengan nu lacu / Ta-Paw-Tay, i Macau nu mukasiay a pawtay, u Cunkuo aydaay nu masingaay a nisangaan patideng tu sise' a nisangaan. 大炮台, . naw Macau nu hitayan a sakalepacawan nu kahemekan, ayda u Macau nu likisian a kakitidaan. . Tapawtay itida i Macau nu pangkiw suba nu taban nu cunyung Se buyu' , u sakay nu hitayan a nipikuwanan. . aydaay nu Tapawtay itida i teban u caysiw-siwwal a mihcaan nipatidengan i Macau (Aw-Men 澳門) po-wu-kuan , tungduh nu Tapawtay u Pawtay nu balubaluan. . Ta-San-Pa paya atu ta-paw-tay nina tusaay a aidangan milacad tu Cunpu picidekan nu lalangawan, mala picidekan nu Macau (Aw-Men 澳門) nu waluay a aidangan. Macau Ta-Paw-Tay patideng i caynem-caysip mihcaan, naw naw yi-su-huay sen-paw-lu nu cacudadan a kiwkay a sayday, midiput tunikay Macau nu yi-su-huay , nikuda satu mala Aw-Pu cen-hu namin. patidengan tu Ta-Paw-Tay makaala tu cacay a bataan, itini i caynem-tunem a masangan. . Ta-Paw-Tay atu Ma-Ke-Paw-Tay atu Dun-Wan-Yang-Paw-Tay mala tanektekay nu liklik nu hitayan, matalaw cumudan nu kukung. namaka cacay a malebut enem a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tulu a mihcaan (1623) katukuh tu cacay a malebut pitu a lasubu sepat a bataan (1740) a mihecaan, naw Cen-Fan-Si-Lin atu Macau (Aw-Men 澳門) nu satalakaway a enengan nu luma'. 從1623 . Ta-Paw-Tay kakenihan i caysiw-nemnem mihcaan amahulak, pasayda i katuuday u aidangan kuyni sa. nikahulak satu nanisumadan tu sakay Aw-Men papatinakuwan tu demiad , nikudan nu Aw-Men papatinakuwan tu demiad itini i caysiw-siwnem mihcaan taydan i Dan-Cai . Ta-Paw-Tay namakakenih i caysiw-siwtu mihcaan, caysiw-siwlu mihcaan atu caysiw-siwnem mihcaan misumad tu papatidengan. . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu a mihcaan (1998), teban nu Ta-Paw-Tay patideng tu Macau (Aw-Men 澳門) po-wu-kuan , sayaway numitanengay a labang han u Ingkuo mitukuday tu mali ci Manlen.. 1998年, .

== Satabakiyay no aenengan no laco / Ta-Paw-Tay == Satabakiay no aenengan no laco / Ta-Paw-Tay, i Macao no mokasiay a pawtay, o Conkoo aydaay no masingaay a nisangaan patideng to sise' a nisangaan. 大炮台, . naw Macao no hitayan a sakalepacawan no kahemekan, ayda o Macao no likisian a kakitidaan. . Tapawtay itida i Macao no pangkiw soba no taban no conyong Se boyo' , o sakay no hitayan a nipikowanan. . aydaay no Tapawtay itida i teban o caysiw-siwwal a mihcaan nipatidengan i Macao (Aw-Men 澳門) po-wo-koan , tongdoh no Tapawtay o Pawtay no balobaloan. . Ta-San-Pa paya ato ta-paw-tay nina tosaay a aidangan milacad to Conpo picidekan no lalangawan, mala picidekan no Macao (Aw-Men 澳門) no waloay a aidangan. Macao Ta-Paw-Tay patideng i caynem-caysip mihcaan, naw naw yi-so-hoay sen-paw-lo no cacodadan a kiwkay a sayday, midipot tonikay Macao no yi-so-hoay , nikoda sato mala Aw-Po cen-ho namin. patidengan to Ta-Paw-Tay makaala to cacay a bataan, itini i caynem-tonem a masangan. . Ta-Paw-Tay ato Ma-Ke-Paw-Tay ato Don-Wan-Yang-Paw-Tay mala tanektekay no liklik no hitayan, matalaw comodan no kokong. namaka cacay a malebot enem a lasobo tosa a bataan idaw ko tolo a mihcaan (1623) katokoh to cacay a malebot pito a lasobo sepat a bataan (1740) a mihecaan, naw Cen-Fan-Si-Lin ato Macao (Aw-Men 澳門) no satalakaway a enengan no loma'. 從1623 . Ta-Paw-Tay kakenihan i caysiw-nemnem mihcaan amaholak, pasayda i katooday o aidangan koyni sa. nikaholak sato nanisomadan to sakay Aw-Men papatinakowan to demiad , nikodan no Aw-Men papatinakowan to demiad itini i caysiw-siwnem mihcaan taydan i Dan-Cai . Ta-Paw-Tay namakakenih i caysiw-siwto mihcaan, caysiw-siwlo mihcaan ato caysiw-siwnem mihcaan misomad to papatidengan. . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko walo a mihcaan (1998), teban no Ta-Paw-Tay patideng to Macao (Aw-Men 澳門) po-wo-koan , sayaway nomitanengay a labang han o Ingkoo mitokoday to mali ci Manlen.. 1998年, .
